name: PeacoQC
description: Perform quality control of flowcytometry data using PeacoQC.

properties.name: MAD
properties.description: The MAD parameter. Default is 6. If this is increased, the algorithm becomes less strict

properties.name: IT_limit
properties.description: The IsolationTree parameter. Default is 0.55. If this is increased, the algorithm becomes less strict

properties.name: remove_zeros
properties.description: Default is FALSE. If TRUE, the zero values will be removed before the peak detection step. They will not be indicated as ’bad’ value. Recommended when cleaning mass cytometry data
